properties.areaDesc: Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to Inner Saginaw Bay; Lake Huron from Sturgeon Point to Alabaster MI 5NM off shore to US/Canadian border
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued February 20 at 3:03PM EST until February 22 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 30 knots from the
southwest with gusts up to 35 knots. The largest significant
waves will be 7 feet with a potential maximum wave height of
10 feet.

* WHERE...Lake Huron from Sturgeon Point to Alabaster MI beyond
5NM off shore and Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port
Austin MI to Inner Saginaw Bay.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 6 PM EST Friday
with the largest waves expected around 8 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT
